org.grouplens.lenskit.data.history

Class BasicUserHistory<E extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.history.AbstractUserHistory<E>
          • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.history.BasicUserHistory<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The type of event in this history.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.Collection<E>, java.util.List<E>, UserHistory<E>

    public class BasicUserHistory<E extends Event>
extends AbstractUserHistory<E>
implements UserHistory<E>
    Basic user rating profile backed by a collection of ratings. The event list aspects of the profile are implemented as a read-only delegation to an underlying list.
    See Also:
    History.forUser(long, List)

      • filter

        public <T extends Event> UserHistory<T> filter(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Filter the user history to only contain elements of a particular type.

        This implementation filters into a new BasicUserHistory backed by an ArrayList.

        Specified by:
        filter in interface UserHistory<E extends Event>
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of element to include.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of elements to include.
        Returns:
        A user history containing only the elements of the specified type.

      • filter

        public UserHistory<E> filter(Predicate<? super E> pred)
        Filter the user history with a predicate.

        This implementation filters into a new BasicUserHistory backed by an ArrayList.

        Specified by:
        filter in interface UserHistory<E extends Event>
        Parameters:
        pred - The predicate to with which to filter the history.
        Returns:
        A copy of this user history containing only elements which match the predicate.
